title: create minimal repro steps
description: write deterministic, minimal reproduction steps for a bug.
context: prefer smallest scope that still fails; remove non-essentials.
instructions: 1) restate the failure and expected behavior. 2) propose minimal steps to reproduce (env, data, actions). 3) attach a tiny code snippet or script if helpful. 4) include a sanity check to confirm the repro.
model_tips: use seed data and fixed timestamps to avoid flakiness.
